channel.title: Making a private server with no-ip
channel.description:
ok first off you can play moparscape on the webclient or you can download it anyway... you first need to download the newest java jdk 5.0 at sun.com go to this link-> http://www.sun.com/download/index.jsp?cat=Java%20%26%20Technologies&tab=3 download java se developemnt kit (JDK) 6 and netbean IDE 5.5 final release another screen will pop up and it will ask for online or offline installation click on online installation and then install that and finish
Now you will need textpad to modify your shops and npc and etc.. so download textpad here -> http://www.textpad.com/download/index.html and download your language mainly english
ok then your going to need a source here is a link to download them -> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56739.0.html and download a source
then go to no-ip and register there then you will have to login and add a host from the left hand side make the name the name of your server and make it no-ip.info or .org or .servegame.com whatever u want then u will have to go to the top and download no-ip and install it in then when u install it u should see a little box in the bottom right hand corner of your screen bring it up and you should see your server then click in the box and x that out
now u have to configure the thing for your router in your adress box type in 192.168.0.1 or 192.168.0.0 and sign into what your name and pass is mine was admin and i had no pass then you have to find gaming applications or applications if u downloaded a pk source u have to put in 5555 if u didnt its 43594 in all the boxes except the top 1 thats what yur server name is u have to inclue no-ip.info or whatever u chose then the drop down boxes if u have them put it on both if not leave it how it is and then add it u have to enable it before u save it then bring up moparscape and type in a name or pass and your server ip and it should work hopfully :rolleyes: if theres any trouble send me a aim or yahoo or message me orr.. post below
i hope this helps [br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:32:33 PM[/size][hr]plz post if this helps our u have any questions

item.title: Making a private server with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

ok first off you can play moparscape on the webclient or you can download it
anyway…
you first need to download the newest java jdk 5.0 at sun.com
go to this link->
http://www.sun.com/download/index.jsp?cat=Java%20%26%20Technologies&tab=3
download java se developemnt kit (JDK) 6 and netbean IDE 5.5 final release
another screen will pop up and it will ask for online or offline installation
click on online installation
and then install that and finish

Now you will need textpad to modify your shops and npc and etc…
so download textpad here -> http://www.textpad.com/download/index.html and download your language
mainly english

ok then your going to need a source
here is a link to download them -> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56739.0.html
and download a source

then go to no-ip and register there then you will have to login and add a host from the left hand side
make the name the name of your server and make it no-ip.info or .org or .servegame.com whatever u want
then u will have to go to the top and download no-ip and install it in
then when u install it u should see a little box in the bottom right hand corner of your screen
bring it up and you should see your server then click in the box and x that out

now u have to configure the thing for your router
in your adress box type in 192.168.0.1 or 192.168.0.0 and sign into what your name and pass is
mine was admin and i had no pass
then you have to find gaming applications or applications
if u downloaded a pk source u have to put in 5555 if u didnt its 43594 in all the boxes except the top 1
thats what yur server name is u have to inclue no-ip.info or whatever u chose
then the drop down boxes if u have them put it on both if not leave it how it is and then add it
u have to enable it before u save it
then bring up moparscape and type in a name or pass and your server ip and it should work hopfully :rolleyes: if theres any trouble send me a aim or yahoo or message me orr… post below

i hope this helps [br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:32:33 PM[/size][hr]plz post if this helps our u have any questions

Read full topic
item.source: Making a private server with no-ip
